_sText:
This is outdated but functional version and same as final version. Final is mg 4all multigames (without rc1) ================== Unlike other maps, this map consists of only 4 categories (modes)
- Knife
- Weapons
- Special
- Jumps Each of these categories has its own levels:
- Knife 3 different maps
- Weapons 3 different maps
- Special Arena 1 (knife arena and 1 leader with awp per team)
- Special arena 2 (role playing - each team has its own hero (mostly)
- Jumps - Race and Climb ... and each of these levels has its own settings
- HP value
- Weapons
- Difficulty
